content: The certificate is for a Major Project titled 'NeuroVision: Affective Neuro-Insights for Smart Marketing Campaigns' by Aditi Sirigineedi & Rishav Bhagat for the B. Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science) at Mahatma Gandhi Institute of Technology affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Hyderabad.
Certificate issued by Mahatma Gandhi Institute of Technology in Hyderabad for a major project submission.
Project titled 'NeuroVision: Affective Neuro-Insights for Smart Marketing Campaigns' submitted by students Aditi Sirigineedi & Rishav Bhagat.
Project submitted for partial fulfillment of B. Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science) at Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Hyderabad.
Project work done under the guidance of Dr. Barnali Gupta Banik and Dr. M. Rama Bai.
Results of the project have not been submitted elsewhere for any degree or diploma award.
Consider streamlining the certificate text further for conciseness and clarity.
Ensure that the vital information about the project, students, university affiliation, and supervisors is clearly communicated in a more compact manner.
Review the certificate text to maintain a balance between brevity and completeness.
